data.text: Nan gumazamiziba, kɨ ian sure damuamin mɨgɨrɨgɨaba ia deragh da baragh.
Kɨ akar isɨn zuibar bizir mogomemɨn itibav kɨmam.
Akar kaba en inazir afeziaba fomɨra dav mɨkemegha gɨfa.
E akar kaba uan boribar ghuangsɨghan kogham.
God Akar Gavgaviba isa Israelian gumazamizibagh anɨngi.
Eghtɨ men borir gɨn otivamiba uaghan dagh fogh,
Me kamaghɨn damuva, nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn ikɨ,
Me uan inazir afeziabar arazibar gɨn mangan markɨ.
Fomɨra Efraimɨn adarazi piba ko bariba inigha mɨsoghasa zuima,
Me Godɨn Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavim batuegha, an akamɨn gɨn zuir puvatɨ.
A men damazibar amizir mirakelba ko,
God en inazir afeziabar damazibar Isipɨn kantrin aven,
God ongarim abɨghizɨ ongarim vong ko vongɨn tughav itima,
An aruebar ghuariamɨn tongɨn ikia men faragha zui.
A gumazamiziba puvatɨzir danganimɨn dagɨaba abɨzi, dɨpar nguazimɨn aven mar itiba otifi.
A dɨpabagh amizɨ, da dagɨamɨn azenan otiva,
A kamaghɨn amima, me gumazamiziba puvatɨzir danganimɨn ikia,
Me God isɨ ingangarim datɨgh an gan foghasa,
Me God dɨpova ghaze,
A guizbangɨra faragha dagɨam mɨsoghezɨ dɨpam azenan otogha afora uaghiri.
Ikiavɨra Itir God kamaghɨn me baregha an adarim bar ekevezɨ,
Me kamaghɨn nɨghnɨzi puvatɨ:
An nɨghnɨzim men ikiavɨra itima,
Egha a uan Nguibamɨn manan daghem isa gumazamizibagh anɨdi.
Enselba apir dagheba, God dar avɨriba isa me ganɨngizɨ,
God uan gavgavimɨn, aruem anadi naghɨn ko sautɨn amadaghan izir amɨnim amadazɨ
A nguazir mɨnemniaba ko, ongarir gigimɨn mɨn,
God kuarazir kaba amangizɨ da danganir me itimɨn,
Dagher gumazamizir kaba iniasa ifongeziba, God da me ganɨngi.
Me apima dagheba men akatoribar ikiavɨra itima,
God bizir kabagh ami, ezɨ me arazir kurabagh amua ghuavɨra iti.
A mati gumazim uan akamɨn amɨnim giverazɨ an otogha ghua pura gɨvazɨ moghɨn,
God men maraziv soghezɨ me ariaghirezɨ,
Me ua nɨrɨgha ghaze,
Mɨgɨrɨgɨar me amir kaba, da bar guizbangɨra puvatɨ,
Me an akabar gɨn zuir puvatɨ,
Ezɨ a men apangkuvighavɨra ikia,
An nɨghnɨzim, me gumazibara,
Me gumazamiziba puvatɨzir danganimɨn,
Me zurara Godɨn gavgavim gɨfofoghasa, a gavgavis ti o puvatɨ?
God men akuragha men apanibar dafariba da ua me inizir gavgavir kam,
A mirakelɨn arazir kaba,
A Isipian fanebagh amizɨ ghuzim dar otozɨ,
A berezir avɨriba ko, mɨtivir avɨriba me bagha da amangizɨ,
An apiziba ko, odeziba amangizɨ,
An amozir ofɨzir dagɨabar mɨn gariba amangizɨ,
An aisɨn amozir ofɨzir ekiaba amangizɨ da iza,
An adarir bar ekiam men ikia men anɨngaghegha,
A men atara me ataghizɨ me itir puvatɨ.
Isipian adarazir otarir ivariaba, a vaghvagha bar me mɨsoghezɨ me ariaghire.
A sipsipbagh eghuvir gumazimɨn mɨn,
A me ko zuima me atiatir puvatɨgha deraghavɨra ghuava otifi.
A me inigha ghua uan nguazir a ua bagha inabazimra me atɨ.
Israelia izezɨ, a ikɨzir igharazibar gumazamiziba batuegha, nguazir kaba abɨgha
Me Godɨn gavgavim gɨfofoghasa, a gavgavis, ti puvatɨ?
Men inazir afeziaba faragha amizɨ moghɨn, me an akaba batogha nɨghnɨzir gavgavim dar itir puvatɨ.
Me mɨghsɨabar ghua asebar ofa gamir dakozibar ingarizɨ, God puvɨra men atari.
God bizir kabar gara adarir ekiam ikia,
A Dɨpenir Silon nguibamɨn itimɨn ikia, e ko iti.
An apanibar amamangatɨzɨ me an Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavim itir Boksiam inigha ghu.
A uan gumazamizibar atara,
Men otarir igiaba mɨdorozimɨn aven bar ariaghirezɨma,
Apaniba men ofa gamir gumazibav sozi me ariaghɨrima,
Ekiam akuavia osegha,
A uan apanibav sogha me abɨnigha men agɨntɨghizɨ me ghuegha,
A Josepɨn adarazir ovavir boribar aghua.
A Saionɨn Mɨghsɨar a ifongegha uabɨ itim ko Judan anabam,
A Saionɨn Mɨghsɨar kamɨn uan Dɨpenimɨn ingarizɨ,
Godɨn ingangarir gumazim Devit, uan sipsipbar gara itima,
A sipsipbar garir ingangarim an anogoregha,
Devit uan navir aghuimɨn gɨn ghua deragha men gari.
